summary: A mod dedicated to all Witch hunters, Nightblades and dark mages of skyrim. New spells, special arrows, weapons, accesories, followers and merchants.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b]The Shadow Arsenal[/b][/size]



[b]ORIGINAL SPANISH VERSION [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88877]HERE[/url]﻿[/b]


[b]NOTE 1:[/b] ENGLISH IS NOT MY MAIN LANGUAGE. SORRY FOR ANY SPELLING OR GRAMMAR MISTAKE
[b]NOTE 2:[/b] THE MOD DOES NOT INCLUDE NEW TEXTURES OR MODELS. IT USES THE ONES INCLUDED IN THE GAME


I don't have Skyrim SE. If someone wants to convert it, please tell me ;)




[size=4][b]OVERVIEW[/b][/size]

15 new spells (3 for each school)
10 new weapons/shield (some of them craftable)
7 new potions and 2 new ingredientes (created in a cooking pot)
6 new special arrows
3 new accesories
3 new scrolls
2 new followers
2 new merchants (one is a fence)
Craftable lockpicks
Craftable silver weapons
Craftable crossbows without being part of the DG (only the basic crossbow)
Reduction of casting sound of fire, frost and shock runes from Loud to Normal





[size=4][b]WANT TO KNOW MORE?[/b][/size]

You have two options:

Some people say that Lucano in Riverwood was talking to a strange man. Maybe you can find some clues there...

[b][size=4]Or, you can read the documentation[/size][/b]


___________________________________________________________________________________________________________

THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS, PLEASE REPORT ANY BUG YOU FIND
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD



[b]FUTURE PLANS:[/b]

MAKE SOME ITEMS UNIQUE.
[/center][center]﻿[/center]
author: Msant
